mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_NO,P.PROD_NM, CNT , RNK FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN (SELECT PROD_NO,RANK()OVER (ORDER BY CNT DESC) AS RNK,CNT FROM (SELECT PROD_NO,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ORDER_PROD GROUP BY PROD_NO) OP) ROP ON P.PROD_NO = ROP.PROD_NO WHERE ROP.RNK <= 3

SELECT P.PROD_NO,REG_NO,PC.CAT_NM,PROD_NM,POINT,CON,SALE_STAT,PROD_DT,PA.FILE_ADDR FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN (SELECT PROD_NO,FILE_ADDR,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY PROD_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM PROD_ATTC) PA ON P.PROD_NO = PA.PROD_NO AND RNK = 1 INNER JOIN PROD_CAT PC ON P.CAT_NO = PC.CAT_NO WHERE P.DEL=1

SELECT P.PROD_NO,REG_NO,CAT_NO,PROD_NM,POINT,CON,SALE_STAT,PROD_DT,PA.FILE_ADDR FROM PRODUCT P JOIN (SELECT PROD_NO,FILE_ADDR,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY PROD_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM PROD_ATTC) PA ON P.PROD_NO = PA.PROD_NO AND RNK = 1 WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(CART_NO, PROD_NO, M_NO, OPT_NO) SELECT CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{prodNo},#{sMNo},OPT_NO FROM PROD_OPT WHERE PROD_NO= #{prodNo} AND PRICE = #{price} AND UNIT=#{unit}
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.M_NO,O.OPT_NO,O.PRICE,O.UNIT,P.CON,P.PROD_NM,P.POINT,PA.FILE_ADDR,P.PROD_NO FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO JOIN PROD_OPT O ON C.OPT_NO = O.OPT_NO JOIN ( SELECT PROD_NO,FILE_ADDR,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY PROD_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM PROD_ATTC) PA ON C.PROD_NO = PA.PROD_NO AND RNK = 1 WHERE C.M_NO = #{sMNo}
SELECT COUNT(C.PROD_NO) AS CNT ,NVL(SUM(P.POINT),0) AS SUM FROM CART C JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PROD_NO= P.PROD_NO WHERE C.M_NO = #{sMNo}
SELECT O.ORD_NO as ORD_NO FROM (SELECT ORD_NO,USER_NO,RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY USER_NO ORDER BY ORD_NO DESC) RNK FROM ORD) O WHERE USER_NO = #{sMNo} AND RNK= 1
mapper.update: UPDATE M SET POINT = #{totalPInp} WHERE M_NO= #{sMNo}
mapper.select: SELECT P.PROD_NO,P.PROD_NM,PC.CAT_NM,P.POINT,P.SALE_STAT ,P.CON FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CAT PC ON P.CAT_NO = PC.CAT_NO WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{no}
SELECT PA.FILE_ADDR ,PA.ATTC_NO FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_ATTC PA ON P.PROD_NO=PA.PROD_NO WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_ATTC (ATTC_NO, PROD_NO, FILE_ADDR) VALUES (PROD_ATTC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pNo}, #{bFile})
mapper.select: SELECT PA.ATTC_NO FROM (SELECT ATTC_NO, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY PROD_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO DESC) AS RNK FROM PROD_ATTC WHERE PROD_NO = #{pNo}) PA WHERE PA.RNK = 1
SELECT CAT_NO,CAT_NM FROM PROD_CAT WHERE DEL = 1
